title: Design and Implementation of E-Learning Environments Using Activity-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematics Knowledge and Digital Device Usage Proficiency
context.additional_context: Customized learning environments for medical/legal/technical professionals to improve mathematical problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can design activities to solve various mathematical problems using basic functions of the CADI framework
Learners can perform collaborative and individual learning activities in BYOD environments with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can present mathematical thinking processes in logical structures of at least three stages through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
